Text: Thanks for all of the first three seasons.  The first episode of S04 was really full of bad acting and a very poorly written script. Looks like it will be the last season IMHO. Just another cop show now. Too bad, it could have been so much more.
I agree. This show could have been so much more. Think of Medium. That show was great IMHO.

I really hate how the comments don't show sometimes. 

I wanted to ask a question How do I get a skull next to my name? I don't have a lot of torrents but what I do upload is always the best and tends to be a rare or harder to find torrent.
BTW if you guys are commenting I am sorry if I don't respond. I can't see all the comments for some reason. It shows 6 comments and I can only see thetorrentlord's and mine.
